hero.title: Creating Jerenyon.
hero.subtitle: Geospatial expertise meets Generative AI: how & why I built Jerenyon.

jerenyon-dev.title: The Story of Jerenyon
jerenyon-dev.subtitle: Jerenyon: Bridging Generative AI, Automation, and Geospatial Intelligence

paragraphs.p1: Jerenyon is a platform dedicated to web development and automation — it is a platform dedicated to integrating Generative AI, Automation, and Geospatial Intelligence. With a vision to simplify complex workflows, Jerenyon delivers AI-powered automation systems and geospatial solutions that transform data into actionable insights and enhance decision-making.
paragraphs.p2: Specializing in AI-augmented automation and spatial data processing, Jerenyon builds intelligent tools, adaptable workflows, and scalable applications. From LLM-powered document processing to AI-driven data analysis and geospatial automation, Jerenyon provides tailored solutions designed to streamline operations and drive innovation.
paragraphs.p3: Beyond delivering technical solutions, Jerenyon fosters knowledge-sharing and community. Through articles, tutorials, and project showcases, it offers practical insights into AI-enhanced automation, Python backend development, Next.js frontends, and geospatial intelligence — helping others explore the potential of these technologies.
paragraphs.p4: With a commitment to continuous learning and cutting-edge research, Jerenyon empowers businesses to harness AI and automation, staying ahead in an AI-driven world. Whether you seek to integrate Generative AI, automate complex workflows, or enhance geospatial capabilities, Jerenyon is your partner for transformative digital solutions.

jeremie.title: The Mind Behind Jerenyon
jeremie.subtitle: Introducing Jeremie, the Founder of Jerenyon

paragraphs.p1: I am an Software Engineer, specialized in Generative AI and Geospatial Intelligence, with a passion for building AI-driven automation systems and geospatial solutions. My journey began with a Master in Geography, evolving into expertise in backend development, automation, and AI integration. I focus on transforming complex data into accessible, decision-ready insights through intelligent, adaptable systems.
paragraphs.p2: With extensive experience in designing scalable applications and leading AI R&D initiatives, I specialize in LLMs, RAG architectures, and AI agent workflows. My approach emphasizes practical applications of AI — building tools that enhance automation and streamline business processes, rather than focusing on foundational model development.
paragraphs.p3: Jerenyon is my platform to merge Generative AI, Automation, and Geospatial Intelligence into impactful, real-world solutions. It also serves as a knowledge hub, where I share hands-on insights into AI-powered workflows, Python development, Next.js applications, and spatial data processing. Through this venture, my goal is to simplify complexity and deliver innovative, AI-enhanced digital solutions for developers and businesses alike.

hero.title: Explore, Learn, Build.
hero.subtitle: Delve into blog posts, How-Tos, and project showcases on automation, development, and geospatial solutions.

intro.p1: This space is where ideas meet practicality! It has been thought as a collection of articles, tutorials, and insights aimed at making technical concepts accessible to everyone, regardless of skill level. My goal is to keep things light yet meaningful, blending technical depth with clarity and a touch of creativity.
intro.p2: I am not here to reinvent the wheel or repeat what is already out there. Instead, I strive to demystify topics, sharing solutions and approaches rooted in real-world challenges. Whether you are exploring Python, geospatial intelligence/GIS, diving into AI, or automating processes, the content here is designed to inform, inspire, and occasionally make you smile.
intro.p3: Because learning should be as enjoyable as it is empowering.

bookshelf.title: On my Bookshelf
bookshelf.intro: Books have always been my go-to source of inspiration, an inexhaustible source of knowledge, and a magical door into my imagination. In this section, I am sharing the books that have shaped my understanding of programming, problem-solving, and more. Each entry includes my takeaways, giving you a glimpse into the insights that keep me growing. Whether you are a fellow bookworm or just looking for your next read, I hope you will find these recommendations as enlightening as I have.

item1.label: Founder & Full-Stack Software Engineer
item1.summary: Building AI-powered automation tools that bridge full-stack development and geospatial expertise to deliver scalable web applications and practical innovation.

description.p1: Architected and developed Jerenyon, a platform showcasing and integrating AI-driven automation with geospatial solutions (FastAPI, Next.js, LangChain, CrewAI, ChromaDB, Neo4j).
description.p2: Developing tools that merge Generative AI (LLMs, RAG, AI agents) with spatial intelligence to unlock next-gen mapping and infrastructure automation.
description.p3: Building and curating a knowledge hub to share real-world insights, methodologies, and lessons from hands-on projects in AI and geospatial automation.

item2.label: TensorFlow Developer Specialization
item2.summary: Completed TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate, mastering neural network training, image recognition with convolutions, and NLP. Gained practical skills in building AI solutions using TensorFlow.

item3.label: Deep Learning Specialization
item3.summary: Completed Deep Learning Specialization, mastering neural networks, including CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, and Transformers. Gained expertise in applying these models to real-world tasks like NLP, speech recognition, and more using Python and TensorFlow.

item4.label: Machine Learning Specialization
item4.summary: Completed Machine Learning Specialization, mastering key techniques like supervised and unsupervised learning, recommender systems, and reinforcement learning. Gained practical skills to apply these methods to real-world challenges.

item5.label: Full-Stack Software Engineer | Continuous Improvement Advisor
item5.summary: Driving innovation and automation through AI-driven solutions, full-stack development, and geospatial expertise to enhance operational efficiency and data accessibility.

description.p1: Developed and deployed Generative AI solutions, including RAG chatbots and AI agents (LangChain, CrewAI, ChromaDB, Neo4j), reducing manual query resolution time by 50% and improving data accessibility.
description.p2: Engineered AI-driven automation workflows using LangChain, Vercel AI SDK, and prompt engineering to streamline processes and boost efficiency.
description.p3: Spearheaded the design, development, and deployment of a cloud-based automation platform (Next.js, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, Azure) to optimize processes and centralize R&D capabilities.
description.p4: Engineered scalable APIs and built complex automation pipelines (GeoPandas, Shapely, ArcGIS API, FastAPI, Django, PostgreSQL) for seamless service integration and data processing.
description.p5: Led the transformation of manual workflows into automated, data-driven geospatial solutions, reducing project timelines and improving network design accuracy.
description.p6: Built and mentored an agile development team, fostering autonomy and promoting modern software methodologies.
description.p7: Managed Azure cloud infrastructure, overseeing web apps, databases, container registries, networking, and CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployments.

item6.label: Co-Founder & Full-Stack Software Engineer
item6.summary: Leading technical strategy and full-stack development for a creative e-commerce platform.

description.p1: Led the technical development and implementation of a custom e-commerce platform (Next.js, Vercel, PostgreSQL, Stripe, Clerk, Bunny.net), transitioning from a WordPress-based system.
description.p2: Designed the platform's architecture and implemented full-stack solutions to support the sale of digital products.
description.p3: Defined the tech stack strategy, leveraging Python (FastAPI) and React (Next.js) to create a seamless, future-ready platform.
description.p4: Managed business operations, including finances and regulatory compliance, to streamline processes and drive growth.

item7.label: GIS Automation Engineer | Fiber Network Designer
item7.summary: Integrated fiber network design with Python automation and GIS technology to drive digital transformation.

description.p1: Engineered and drafted fiber network designs for FTTx and PON architectures.
description.p2: Pioneered the integration of GIS technologies (QGIS, AutoCAD Map 3D) and developed custom geoprocessing models and AutoLISP tools to optimize spatial analysis and design workflows.
description.p3: Developed Python-based automation solutions and on-premise SaaS tools with GUIs (PySide6, PyInstaller) to streamline processes and enhance operational efficiency.
description.p4: Established scalable PostgreSQL/PostGIS databases on Azure for advanced geospatial data management and cloud development.

item8.label: Master of Science in Geography (MSc)
item8.summary: Advanced expertise in physical geography, GIS intelligence, and spatial analysis with a focus on hydrogeomorphology, climatology, and coastal risk management in littoral environments.

description.p1: Specialized in the scientific study and management of environmental resources, with a focus on physical geography, hydrogeomorphology, and natural risk assessment, particularly in littoral regions.
description.p2: Acquired advanced expertise in GIS and geomatics, including spatial data processing, cartographic modeling, and integrated analysis of environmental systems.
description.p3: Deepened knowledge in hydrology, climatology, meteorology, and geomorphology, applying multidisciplinary approaches to study coastal processes and storm-induced risks.
description.p4: Gained foundational insights into geology, enhancing the understanding of terrain dynamics, while engaging in fieldwork and laboratory analysis to assess natural and anthropogenic impacts.
description.p5: Completed a 6-month research internship, producing a thesis that combined field studies, theoretical analysis, and GIS-based modeling to address real-world challenges, culminating in a formal oral defense.

item9.label: Bachelor's Degree in Geography
item9.summary: Comprehensive education in physical geography, GIS, and spatial analysis, with a focus on systemic approaches to natural phenomena and littoral studies.

description.p1: Developed a strong foundation in geography, transitioning from introductory concepts to advanced expertise in physical geography and environmental studies.
description.p2: Specialized in GIS and spatial analysis, gaining proficiency in mapping, data visualization, and geospatial intelligence for understanding complex environmental systems.
description.p3: Studied a range of physical geography fields, including hydrology, geology, oceanology, hydrogeomorphology, and climatology, with a focus on littoral processes and natural risks.
description.p4: Embraced a systemic approach to the scientific study of environmental phenomena, considering interconnected dynamics and their implications on broader systems.
description.p5: Gained practical experience through fieldwork and analytical projects, exploring the interactions of natural processes and their impact on human and environmental systems.

item10.label: Microsoft Copilot for Software Development
item10.summary: Completed Microsoft Copilot for Software Development Specialization, mastering AI-driven coding, code reviews, documentation, and project planning with GitHub Copilot.

item11.label: Vector Database Fundamentals
item11.summary: Completed IBM Vector Database Fundamentals Specialization, gaining hands-on experience in vector search, embeddings, ChromaDB, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and AI-powered recommendation systems.

item12.label: IBM Generative AI Engineering
item12.summary: Completed IBM Generative AI Engineering Professional Certificate, gaining hands-on expertise in LLM architectures, fine-tuning, RAG workflows, AI agents, and deploying generative AI applications.

item13.label: Data Structures and Algorithms
item13.summary: Completed Data Structures and Algorithms Specialization, gaining knowledge about algorithmic techniques like greedy algorithms, binary search, and dynamic programming, plus implementing stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.
